skillTree.name: The Brothers Ghorst Corpse Cart
skillTree.description: Initially desiring simply to join his brothers in death, Helman Ghorst now travels atop a Corpse Cart driven by his Undead kin.

effects.description: Mount: The Brothers Ghorst Corpse Cart

skillTree.name: Forbidden Scripture
skillTree.description: Helman Ghorst knows what he should not, but knowing is not enough – he must utilise this denied knowledge.

skillTree.name: Morbid Reunion
skillTree.description: What Helman Ghorst has lost, he will reclaim – no power of this world or beyond will stop him.

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +1 for "Awaken from the Grave"
Effect range: +50% for "Master of the Dead"
Targeting range: +200% for "Awaken From the Grave" and "Awaken From the Grave Upgraded"
Spell number of uses: +2 for "Awaken from the Grave"

skillTree.name: Diabolical Presence
skillTree.description: From atop Ghorst's nightmarish chariot pulse waves of puissant energy, enervating the undead and excoriating the souls of the living.

effects.description: Effect range: +35% for "Vigour Mortis", "Unholy Lodestone" and "The Reliquary Corruption"

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Path to Ruin
skillTree.description: Ghorst traverses the forsaken realm as he did the roads of the Empire, as a groom, before the study of necromancy consumed his every waking moment.

skillTree.name: Unholy Fury
skillTree.description: Mastery of the dark arts has imbued Ghorst with preternatural strength, enabling him to easily hold his own in combat.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +12 for Zombies units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Unnatural Toughness
skillTree.description: Over time, Ghorst's skin has toughened like that of a corpse, causing arrows and sword-blows that would normally kill a man to merely glance off.

effects.description:
Ward save: 10% for Zombies units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Uncanny Resilience
skillTree.description: Having survived the deadly Plague of Blue Roses, even after deliberately infecting himself, Ghorst can easily recover from lesser wounds and sicknesses.

effects.description:
Battle healing cap: +5% for Zombies units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Ever Onward
skillTree.description: By which those caught in Ghorst's Danse Macabre are hurled forward into the fray, becoming far more lethal whilst the spell lasts.

effects.description: Effect range: +50% for "Vanhel's Dance Macabre Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"

Passive ability: "The Ravenous Dead" for Zombies units
	(all armies)

Weapon strength: +50% for Zombies units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Thrall Master
skillTree.description: "Come to my side, my Undead servants. Now, you are bound, irrevocably, to my will forever!"

effects.description: The Dead Rise Again: +7% chance for destroyed units to be restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +15% chance for destroyed units to be restored after battle
Recruit rank: +3 for Skeletal and Zombie units

skillTree.name: Lord of the Scourge
skillTree.description: "And I'll lead you all in the dance," said he - the relentless dance of the tireless Undead hordes.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Skeleton Warriors and Skeleton Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Invocation of Nehek"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gaze of Nagash"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Grave Guards

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Awaken from the Grave Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Grave Guards

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: The Unliving Host
skillTree.description: "Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +9 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call of the Night
skillTree.description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Evil Souls
skillTree.description: Such evil spirits are desperate to spill mortal blood, and will speed along until they find some flesh to carve.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: 5% for Cairn Wraiths, Mournguls and Hexwraiths units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Cairn Wraiths, Mournguls and Hexwraiths units
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 10% for Cairn Wraiths, Mournguls and Hexwraiths units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Cairn Wraiths, Mournguls and Hexwraiths units
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Cairn Wraiths, Mournguls and Hexwraiths units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Night
skillTree.description: The Lord howls out into the night, and is answered by the baying of dark creatures.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Waking Dead
skillTree.description: Vampires summon forth the gruesome remains of the ancient dead to bolster the masses of lesser minions under their control.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Carriages of Death
skillTree.description: By their very nature, most Vampires try to avoid discomfort and travel in style.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +7 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +9 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Legions of Dead
skillTree.description: "…and the legions of the dead envoked all hell upon the world."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dread Knights
skillTree.description: The Undead Lord has followed the warrior's path to its ultimate conclusion, in a dark mockery of a Knight's vow.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Deadly Power
skillTree.description: The power of death cannot be denied.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Mournguls, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Mournguls, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Mournguls, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Flying Horrors
skillTree.description: The Dark Magic-user can take to the skies, defying gravity by metamorphosing into a bat.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

effects.description: The Dead Rise Again: +5% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +10% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +15% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle

skillTree.name: Children of the Night
skillTree.description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Darkling Skies
skillTree.description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Immortal Horror
skillTree.description: Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Necrarch
skillTree.description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

skillTree.name: Eternal Warden
skillTree.description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -10% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -15% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

skillTree.name: Uncanny Prescience
skillTree.description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +15
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Neophyte
backgroundSkills.description: The student thrives on heretical knowledge; dark foundations lead to darker, binding deliverance.

effects.description:
Attribute: Immune to Contact Effects
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +30 for Zombies and Crypt Ghouls units
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

items.name: The Liber Noctus
items.description: This decrepit tome bristles with dark secrets and eldritch powers. Reading from it summons dark thoughts and grim deeds.
